metadata.name: banking77-intent-classification
metadata.description: Banking customer query intent classification - demonstrates rubric-based judge mode

initial_prompt: You are an expert banking assistant. Classify customer queries into exactly one banking intent category. Respond with just the intent label.

input.query: How do I activate my new debit card?
input.context: Customer received a new card in the mail

input.query: I think I lost my credit card somewhere. What should I do?
input.context: Customer is worried about unauthorized use

input.query: How much does it cost to send money to another country?
input.context: Customer wants to make international transfer

input.query: I need to change my PIN number
There's a charge on my statement I don't recognize
The ATM ate my card and didn't give it back
How do I set up direct deposit for my paycheck?
What's the interest rate on savings accounts?
I went over my balance and got charged a fee. Can you waive it?

criteria.name: intent_accuracy
criteria.description: The predicted intent exactly matches the expected banking intent category.

criteria.name: format_compliance
criteria.description: Response contains only the intent label without extra text or explanation.
